data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during La Fleur de Lys cruise from Brest to Martinique started at 1759-01-21
Ship: La Fleur De Lys, Voyage: Brest - Martinique, 1st Observer: D'Oisy (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
